item.title: Visual Studio Code Keyboard Shortcuts
item.author: Author
item.description: Today I learned Visual Studio Code Keyboard Shortcuts for Windows, macOs and Linux.

item.title: Get Local Account Memberships
item.author: Author
item.description: Okay, yeah there are plenty of scripts out which give you local accounts via WMI or ADSI and yes scripts exist also which give you all local groups but there is not one which gives you both (of course there are also some) but what if you’re looking to implement this as a CustomScriptExtension to your Azure VM? Especially if the Custom Script Extension Output is limited to only 4096 characters?

item.title: How to adjust Windows Failover Cluster 'Response to Resource Failure' Policy
item.author: Author
item.description: The purpose of this article is to show how to adjust Windows Failover Cluster “Response to resource failure” policy.
